source:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
The waiting pixie is sick and tired of waiting.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
リダ・ラーンの待ち合わせ中のピクシーは、仲間たちが集まらず困っているようだ。
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_TODO_00<tab>アンデンの羊小屋でかくれんぼ好きのピクシーと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_TODO_01<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “Beaver” to let the hiding pixie know that the game is up.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_TODO_01チャットの「Say」モードで『ビーバー』と入力し
ピクシーを見つけて、かくれんぼを終わらせる
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_TODO_02<tab>かくれんぼ好きのピクシーに報告
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_TODO_03<tab>待ち合わせ中のピクシーと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_001<tab>Grrr, I am so angry right now! My friends promised that we'd play together here, but not one of them have come!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_001んもー！　ワタシ、怒っているのだわ！
みんなで遊びにいくって約束していたのに、
「かくれんぼ好きのピクシー」たちが、全然集まらないの！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_002<tab>Instead they're over in Anden's Airs, playing hide-and-seek! That's the only game they ever play, hmph!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_002このままじゃ、ワタシが遊びに行けないのだわ！
ここでぷんすかしていても仕方ないけど……
大好きなアナタに叱られれば、きっとみんな反省するわ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_003<tab>I want you to march over there and give them a good scolding for me! You're respected in our village, so they'll take your words to heart!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_003「かくれんぼ好きのピクシー」たちは、
「アンデンの羊小屋」の辺りに行くと言ったまま、戻らないの！
探してきて、代わりに叱ってやって欲しいのだわ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_004<tab>The others are over in Anden's Airs, playing hide-and-seek! Go over there and give them a good scolding for me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_004きっと「かくれんぼ好きのピクシー」たちは、
「アンデンの羊小屋」の辺りにいるはずだわ。
ひとっ飛びして探し出して、よ～く叱ってやって欲しいのだわ！

source:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_010...A promise? I don't recall a─
Ahhh! We completely forgot! Oh, we're so sorry!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_010待ち合わせ中のピクシーと……ああっそうだわ、忘れてた！
どうしよ～ごめんなさい！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_011<tab>We would go with you right now, but we're in the midst of a game of hide-and-seek. One of us is still hiding, and we can't well leave them behind. Will you help us search?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_011今ね、かくれんぼをしていたの。
でも友達があとひとり、見つかっていなくて……
このまま残しては帰れないもの、一緒に探してもらっていい～？

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_012<tab>Thank you! Now, when you find them, you must say the word “beaver.” It's the rules!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_012ありがと！
見つけたときは「ビーバー！」と言うのがルールなの。
そう言わないと、かくれんぼが終わらないわ！

TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_013この近くにいるはずなんだけれど……
どこに隠れたのかしらっ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_014<tab>Our last hiding friend should be somewhere nearby. Remember, when you find them, you must say the word “beaver.” It's the rules!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_014友達は、この近くにいるはずだわ。
見つけたら「ビーバー！」と言って、かくれんぼを終わらせるの！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_SYSTEM_100_021<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “Beaver” to let the hiding pixie know that the game is up.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_SYSTEM_100_021チャットの会話モードを「Say」モードにして、
キーボードやソフトウェアキーボードで、
『ビーバー』を含む好きな言葉を入力しましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_BIBAPIXIE03426_100_022<tab>(Shhh! Can't you see I'm trying to hide!?)
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_BIBAPIXIE03426_100_022………………。
……いま、かくれんぼ中よ！
真剣なんだから！

source:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_BIBAPIXIE03426_000_020Oh no, I am found!
...Wait, aren't you )) (( )) 02 /var>!? I didn't know you were playing too! This makes it even more fun, tee hee!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_BIBAPIXIE03426_000_020わわ、見つかっちゃったぁ！
……ってあれ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
うふふ～、探しにきてくれたのね！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_BIBAPIXIE03426_100_030<tab>Tee hee, it was so fun being found by you! You must play hide-and-seek with us again!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_BIBAPIXIE03426_100_030うふふ！　さっきは見つけてくれて、嬉しかったの～！
また遊んでちょうだいね！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_030<tab>You did well to find our hiding friend! We would never have thought to look there!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_030見つけてくれたのね！
そんなところに隠れられる場所があったなんて、驚きなのだわ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_031<tab>But come, it wouldn't do to keep our waiting friend waiting any longer. They aren't the most patient of pixies.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_031ふう、それじゃあ帰って、あの子にごめんなさいをしなくっちゃ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんも、リダ・ラーンで、
「待ち合わせ中のピクシー」に、声をかけてあげてね！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_040<tab>The others finally came, thanks to you! But what's this I hear about you playing hide-and-seek with them?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_040ふふん、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんのおかげで、
みんな戻ってきたのだわ！
白熱のかくれんぼ、ワタシも参加したかったけどー！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_041<tab>That's not fair! I want to be found by you too! Promise me you'll play with us again soon!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_041みんな、アナタとかくれんぼができて、とっても楽しかったみたい！
今度はワタシとも、遊びましょーねっ！
